charges.charge_description: 18:1956(a)(1)(A)(i), (a)(1)(B)(i) &; 18:2 LAUNDERING OF MONETARY INSTRUMENTS, did knowingly and willfully conduct financial transactions which affect interstate commerce; aid and abet (2s)
